/wiki/Prawat_Wahoram: Prawat Wahoram (born 24 March 1981) is a Thai athlete and multiple Paralympic gold medallist. He competes mainly in category T54 wheelchair racing events.
/wiki/Athletics_at_the_2008_Summer_Paral: Athletics at the 2008 Summer Paralympics were held in Beijing National Stadium from September 8 to September 17. There were 160 gold medals in this sport.
/wiki/Saichon_Konjen: Siachon Konjen (born 30 March 1983) is a Paralympian athlete from Thailand competing mainly in category T54 sprint events.
/wiki/Supachai_Koysub: Supachai Koysub (born 15 July 1977) is an athlete and Paralympian from Thailand competing mainly in category T54 sprint events.
/wiki/Pichet_Krungget: Pichet Krungget (born 16 March 1975) is a Paralympian athlete from Thailand competing mainly in category T53 sprint events.
/wiki/Wheelchair_fencing_at_the_2008_Sum: Wheelchair fencing at the 2008 Summer Paralympics was held in the Fencing Gymnasium of the Olympic Green Convention Centre from 14 September to 17 September.
/wiki/Powerlifting_at_the_2008_Summer_Pa: Powerlifting at the 2008 Summer Paralympics was held in the Beihang University Gymnasium from September 9 to September 16. Any athlete who met a minimum level of disability (as determined by the IPC Powerlifting Classification Committee) could take part in these events.
/wiki/Peth_Rungsri: Peth Rungsri is a Paralympian athlete from Thailand competing mainly in category T52 sprint events.
